summary:
Looking for the Kong to your King, the Clyde to your Clint.
He\'s here Clyde the Imga. A proud specimen of the Elven vassal race of the Imga, The Apeman of Valenwood. 
He\'ll join you on your adventures, if you find him abandoned near the thalmor Embassy.

Compatible with moonpath 2K texture pack and the moonpath to Elsweyr Mod

For more exot
descriptionHtml:
For more exotic additions to skyrim check out the Moonpath to Elsweyr,, the biggest quest mod on the workshop, and the only Elsweyr experience for skyrim, including custom enviroments , quests, voice acting and many more unique enemies

[url]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9782[\\url]

updated to be super sneaky with less sitting., compatible with 1.68
author: Muppetpuppet
